website_summaries.verdict: Comes packaged in vintage-styled tins with an attractive box, making it perfect for gifting.
pros: These 4 soy candles contain 7% essential oils, one each of lavender, freesia, French vanilla and rosemary, all of which have a natural scent and calming effect
Comes in a choice of 2 color and pattern combinations

customer_reviews.title: It's actually smokeless
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful. I got this for myself but it is totally giftable. I light these inside the home hoping the repel mosquitos. I do not smell the typical citronella scent that most mosquito candles have but they have a nice fragrance. The scent fills up the room but there is no smoke. The only time I noticed any smoke was when I blew out the candle, but once I put on the lid of the candle there was no more. Works well and smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: BEST CANDLES I HAVE PURCHASED IN A LONG TIME!
customer_reviews.text: I searched all over the internet for cost conscious candles that smelled good yet did not overwhelm my home. The box is gorgeous!!!! A wonderful way to receive or give a gift! Each candle was small yet had a scent that gave off a delicate smell. There are 4 different candles and each have 4 different soft scents. I switch up daily. The scents last for hours. Love it. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Locke

customer_reviews.title: Win win for the anniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good anniversary gift. As I looked up what the years were to get I found out that wood was the item to get for the year I needed. This set has like a wood/leafy grain look to the tin. The couple I am getting them for enjoys all the sents, lavender, rosemary, French vanilla and freesia. Each candle can burn up to 30 hours! They can enjoy each candle for days. The box they come in is decorative so I do not need to wrap it either.
customer_reviews.author: Lypiphera

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are great little candles. They all smell nice (amenable scents, and not too strong or too faint), they look nice (in the set and individually), and they burn nicely (no popping, smoking, or discoloring the wax). I am very pleased with this purchase. I just wish they were a little bigger since I burn mine for about an hour every day. Still, even using it that much, it lasted over a month, so it has a good life... I just wish I could get the lavender one in a larger size because I was so sad when it ran out :)
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift option
customer_reviews.text: The scent of this candle set is amazing. The containers are also very beautiful. Definitely a great gift option!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful set of candles! The packaging is nice so it would make a good gift for hostess or anyone, really. Each candle tin is also very nice so you can break the set up and give the candles individually if you prefer. The scents are wonderful with a good throw, and have even melting. Really a nice set of candles!
customer_reviews.author: Kcuret

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift box
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for gifting a friend. Perfect gift for casual meeting or visiting friends. Friend liked it very much and the fragrance is amazing and long lasting. Comes in nice packaging i.e. decorative metal containers. would buy more for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect gift set. They smell amazingly good but too bad it is a gift for mom. She will definitely love this scent.
customer_reviews.author: SharkBytes

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling candles
customer_reviews.text: Very good smelling. Just the right size. Wife really loved them at a present. Winter spring summer fall settings.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M.

customer_reviews.title: Look & smell beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this candle set to split between my son’s teachers as part of a spa basket I made. I received several compliments, both on the scent of the candle, and on how beautiful the candle tin was. They were a huge hit, and I’m very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4Me

customer_reviews.title: Great product, awesome scent and an excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this scent candles to my sister as a gift...great gift and beautifully packed by the way....she loved them. I got to smelled them today and they exceed my expectation....
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Cham

customer_reviews.title: Super cute candles, but tins get way too hot
customer_reviews.text: Loved the presentation of this cute gift set, but the tins get so hot as the candles burn. I couldn't pick them up after the candles had been lit, and was afraid of burning the table top. Had to set them on a heat safe coaster to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Berndt

customer_reviews.title: A great price
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift and were loved by the receiver, so much so I ordered a set for me. They smell so good!
customer_reviews.author: barbara troxler

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment with this candles. First the pictures show them as being a loooooooot bigger, they are very tiny and the smell is really not strong at all, you can barely feel it :(
customer_reviews.author: Monica Miotti

customer_reviews.title: no scent
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no scent to the ones I got, they do get very hot, be careful where you put them
customer_reviews.author: Armymom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful!! My momma loved her Mothers Day gift. They are so pretty she doesn't want to burn them.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Hammond

customer_reviews.title: I have mixed feelings about these candles.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these candles to give as Christmas gifts. I was disappointed in the lack of scent and the size. They seemed smaller than I expected. They were packaged well and arrived on time. In retrospect, I feel as though they should be priced around $15 for what you get - not worth the $23 I paid for them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Crickett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful packaging but the smell is rare.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these candles they looked very good but their smell wasn’t at all good. The scent of the candles isn’t what I expected, I can't exactly describe it but its smell is definitely different from the scented candles that I have used before.
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Smell great
customer_reviews.text: My friend loves it! Pros: - smells great when you open the lid! - high quality Cons: - The Inside of the cardboard box should have a print or color to make it more special
customer_reviews.author: Gem C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Candles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these candles for a gift. They were presented very elegantly with a beautiful box and a nice ribbon. The candles smell great and burn clean. My friend loves them! And the tins are artful and a nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the presentation and the candle's design, but unfortunately I couldn't smell the scent when the candle was lit, it doesn't burn evenly, and it burned out so quickly (it only lasted 1 week).
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: "MADE IN VIETNAM"???
customer_reviews.text: THIS BEAUTIFUL BOX SHOULD NOT BE PRINTED IN BOLD HUGE LETTERS ON THE BACK OF THE GIFT BOX "MADE IN VIETNAM"!!! VERY TACKY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Candles for Friend
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a birthday of a close friend. It was part of a gift basket of self indulging items for her to enjoy. So I can't speak to the scents because it was not opened by me but the presentation and the giftability if that is even a word was very good. I hope she enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered candles for a gift, got a thank you note for soaps? So i don't know what was in the box.
customer_reviews.text: I had received these as a gift. Was very impressed so ordered them as a gift for someone. Was surprised when I got a thank you note for soaps. I will never know for sure what was in the delivered box.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Just wow
customer_reviews.text: The box it comes in is so elegant and beautiful. The cases the candles are in are gorgeous! Each one with its own elegant design. The scents are so fresh and strong when lit. I would recommend buying the candles and for the price it is so well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candles
customer_reviews.text: Used for a birthday gift. It was packaged beautifully,and the scents were lovely.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Very giftable.
customer_reviews.text: Gave to daughter for Xmas. She really liked them. Pretty and convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my Mom, she loved it! They look very pretty in person and smell nice
customer_reviews.author: Ellie ♡

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I love the beautiful designs of the tins and the candles all smell great. I love that they are Eco-friendly and 95% soy wax with essential oil.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Streifel

customer_reviews.title: Will make a wonderful gift!  Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a gift, they are beautiful and smell great!!! Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Bradford

customer_reviews.title: BAD CANDLES!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a huge disappointment!! The vanilla candle(best smelling candle) stopped working after only using it one other time! I don’t recommend buying candles from this company!!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: The packaging looks exactly like the photo. Really beautiful for wedding, birthday, anniversary, gifts, etc. they are so nicely packaged and smell great! I hope they make this candle set forever. I would give 10 stars, if I could! Made in Vietnam.
customer_reviews.author: S.  Miller

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about the candles, including the beautiful boxes they come in!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Although this was a gift, the birthday girl loved them and lit one right away. I love the designs on the jars
customer_reviews.author: D FISHER

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift
customer_reviews.text: Candles arrived in good status, the box is beautiful. Perfect for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cristina Moya

customer_reviews.title: BIRTHDAY GIFT
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous birthday gift for a coworker. She loved it. I will purchase one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya

customer_reviews.title: well done
customer_reviews.text: Well, this really is a beautiful set, very pretty, and a great 65th birthday gift as well. She loves it and me too.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: 😄
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect I'm sister love it she thinks is smells amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend for her birthday beautiful packaging and fragrances! Cant wait to purchase some for other gifts and me too!!
customer_reviews.author: linda lou

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Presentation
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I was very impressed with this! I went back and checked the price and I’m blown away! You can’t eat it! Excellent presentation! I felt like I had just opened a gift for myself. Right out of the box, it’s a beautiful gift that looks like it has a much higher price tag than it does. I recommend if you want to treat yourself, or someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: These candles were the perfect gift. They smell so good and they look adorable
customer_reviews.author: Nayeli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a gift !
customer_reviews.text: The item came in on time and the presentation of the box is adorable. I plan to give this as a gift so I don’t know how it is when lit however the scents from each candle smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Krysten Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Packaged very nicely
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift, and they loved it. Soy base so she was super pleased. She said she loved how it was packaged and the scents were perfectly suited for her. I will order again for ME!
customer_reviews.author: Paula from Scottsdale

customer_reviews.title: Great for mom
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my mom on mothers day. Was impressed with the scents and candle holders.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Loved the packaging and the tins they arrived in but that’s about it. They do not give off a great throw unless it you’re burning in an smaller space. Still not strong though. Wouldn’t buy again but they could be nice to have around for the bath as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: A D

customer_reviews.title: They don’t smell good...
customer_reviews.text: Only one of the candles smells good and it’s the vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Everythings good except for scent.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is beautiful and makes it perfect as a gift. But no scent in candles which take out all the points from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Imbl

customer_reviews.title: Unable To Smell Scent When Candle Is Lit
customer_reviews.text: Love how they look I just assumed I would be able to smell the scent once the candle was lit.
customer_reviews.author: Tyria A.

customer_reviews.title: essential for relaxation
customer_reviews.text: need to bring in some positive energy during this crucial time. its scent relaxes me and lets me meditate. update: I read that these could cause fire hazards, so for safety issues, I requested return. Please be careful when using candles.
customer_reviews.author: Shubhra S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty presentation
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty gift. I wish the candle scent was slightly more intense.
customer_reviews.author: CWD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: They're small not really worth the price. Probably can get something better for the money
customer_reviews.author: Crisenthia  Miclat

customer_reviews.title: The scents smelled great and not overpowering
customer_reviews.text: This was received with such a delight. I gifted it to my wife for her birthday. She loves the variety of scents and that packaging was very pleasant and spa like.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Contreras

customer_reviews.title: does not smell!
customer_reviews.text: These candles do not smell at all. I am very disappointed in these candles! I looked at all the reviews and was happy to get these, but they do not smell at all!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: They're fine
customer_reviews.text: The lids get stuck sometimes but they're nice little candles. Scent isn't too strong
customer_reviews.author: Felisha

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift. You don’t have to wrap it, or buy a card because it has one already Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Heily valdes

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed because, I have two candles I can’t relit because the wick got short and can no loner relight the candle 🙁.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: These candles fill a large area with wonderful scent. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Evans

customer_reviews.title: Getting what I paid for and ordered
customer_reviews.text: My 3 girls lived their Mother’s Day gifts. The packaging was beautiful and all 4 candles had delightful aromas. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: janet k doyle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift idea and the price is 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box and tins! Perfect as a gift but kept to myself LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, love the smell, I'm gifting three of them and I might buy more
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It  Smell  really good
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for my mother for mother's day she really love the smell I will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Theve J

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the person I gave it to loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Warber

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and lovely scents
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. She said they were so pretty and smelled so good.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Good look, bad smell
customer_reviews.text: The tins are beautiful but the scents smell very artificial.
customer_reviews.author: SkiWojo

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is pretty but scents are really disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought two to give as gifts after reading positive reviews, but I feel so disappointed and deceived (I had to come back to the page to make sure I had read the reviews correctly). All four of the scents are extremely pungent and unpleasant. To add a positive note, the packaging is pretty--which is why I'm giving it two stars. I unfortunately will not be able to gift these to anyone, and am extra sad that I bought two... :(
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy G

customer_reviews.title: Smelled Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I love scent in my home but these were the worst candles I've ever bought. The presentation made me so excited and made me think they were going to be a good product but DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: overall 5 rating- but only a trace of scent to them
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and tin holders for these soy candles are adorable. the package arrives ready to gift which was a fun surprise to myself. But, the candles barely let off a scent when burning. If you are looking for a candle to fill the room with a pleasant "throw" this isn't the one to buy. Personally, this is what I was hoping for in the candles, I guess I learned a lesson that soy-candles with essential oils aren't my preference. I guess I will gift the remaining three to a friend with a sensitive nose.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Lovely candles!
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle set! I bought this set because I was looking for some nice soy candles to give as gifts for family and friends who we will see at Thanksgiving. They all smell wonderful - rosemary is my favorite, with French vanilla as a close second. The packaging is attractive and perfect for gifting, the candle tins are really pretty and I plan to give them individually instead of as a set. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Expert Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift!
customer_reviews.text: The presentation of this item is fantastic! The box is a beautiful floral design with a bow and there is a gift card inside the box that is very nice. The candles are nestled inside the box so that they don't knock around each other and are a lovely display when the box is opened. The scents are wonderful! Not overwhelming but strong enough to give a fragrant aroma. I am thrilled with this purchase!! I'm sure the recipient will be also.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle in San Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Cute and smells sooo good
customer_reviews.text: These candles smell amazing and are presented so nicely. This is such a great gift for anyone. It comes in really pretty gift box. Each scent comes with a ribbon to make it easy opening. I actually bought these for myself to burn though and I love ❤️ the decor and design as well as the smell!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Light scent, soy based
customer_reviews.text: The candles have a nice, light, earthy scent. Which makes them perfect for gifts because they won't be offensive or obnoxious when burned. They come in pretty little tins but one of them was dented, and so I had to dock a star. Other than that, great candles in a sturdy package.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Perreaux

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and smells good
customer_reviews.text: The candles smell great. I haven't been able to test it for repelling mosquitos cause they aren't out right now. But the tin containers are too pretty to put outside anyways. Will make cute decorative jars even after the candles are through burning. And it comes in a pretty box and ready to gift. Haven't had it for long but the burn time seems pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefect gift set
customer_reviews.text: Nice scented candle gift set. This includes 4 candles that have a really nice organic design that should fit any room. The candles themselves are a pretty nice size. Perfect for the coffee table or kitchen island. They smell really nice with my favorite being french vanilla. Would make a great gift or would be great as a home decor piece.
customer_reviews.author: Robotica Industries

customer_reviews.title: Really nice gift item.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my older granddaughter.She opened it in front of me and we all smelled the jars together. They were really great smelling items. The containers were absolutely gorgeous. She loved it. Great gift item.
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer using soy candles so when I saw this gift box with a few of my favorite scents I had to grab it. This set makes the perfect gift all by itself, in a basket filled with pampering products or separating the candles and adding them individually to multiple gift baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Staze Craze

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: These make the great gift if you enjoy candles. The scent of the candles are absolutely perfect for me. The candles also burned down evenly. The gift box was impressive and everything was packaged well
customer_reviews.author: SANDY G

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift exchange
customer_reviews.text: At my job we had to draw names for a gift exchange. I got someone who I personally know loves candles. This set was a hit! She loved it! She loved the scents and how cute the containers were. I highly recommend these for anyone looking for a good gift to give someone.
customer_reviews.author: AvidAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: I didn't check the scent.
customer_reviews.text: This is part of a birthday gift for one of my daughters who loves scents. The package was wrapped so beautifully that I didn't have the nerve to unwrap it to smell the candles. Figured if it could look this good, it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Adorable candles
customer_reviews.text: These were great party gifts, very elegant containers and packaging but the scent could use some tune up.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene C.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased With This Purchase💕
customer_reviews.text: If you know a candle lover, this is the perfect, affordable gift to gift. Beautiful presentation and lovely scents🌸
customer_reviews.author: Cathye Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Candles
customer_reviews.text: Good for birthday gifts. Scent is 5 star. Nice wrappings and the price is affordable and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rhons rhon

customer_reviews.title: Omg!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST ever...packaged for gifting and the beauty of each candle...smells great...just perfect
customer_reviews.author: MMR

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: The candles come in beautiful tins and have a pleasant scent.Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C from EHT, NJ

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These are all very floral smells, my grandma would love them but that’s pretty much it. The box is very nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Keli

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Tops are very hard to remove and there is no scent to the candles.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A

customer_reviews.title: The look is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Some smells can be improved. But they're very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: traveler

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Candles came in a very nice and presentable box. I am pleased with this set as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great presentation, minimal results
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt really give off any scent, no matter how long its burning.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Yeet
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my mom and they are so cute
customer_reviews.author: Emily Noelle

product_meta.title: YINUO LIGHT Scented Candles Gifts Set for Women Aromatherapy Candles Stress Relief, Upgraded Large Tin of Soy Candle Scented Lavender Candle, Gifts for Mother's Day Birthday Anniversary Bath Yoga
feature_bullets: NATURAL FRAGRANCE - Scented candles gift set with 4 pack, which includes 4 Fragrances- Freesia, Lavender, Rosemary and French Vanilla.
100% NATURAL WAX - Made with100% pure soy wax.Providing a cleaner, longer burn.evenly burning and produce no black smoke, more healthier, harmless to human body and environment

NATURAL INGREDIENT - Made using lead-free cotton wicks and premium, soft, highly-refined perfume-grade fragrance oils to bring you a biodegradable and eco-friendly product that will give you a clean burn and long-lasting hours of aromatic bliss.

LONG LASTING TIME - Wax content 4.4oz per each, 25-30 hours burning time. A total of 100-120 hours of combustion. Providing aromatherapy, creating mood enhancing atmospheres, Stress Relief and relaxation for you.Trim the wicks to help evenly burn and increase burning time.

PERFECT GIFT SET - Aromatherapy candle comes with rich fragrances and beautiful package.They are appropriate for any holiday or special event,such as Valentine's Day,Mother's Day,birthday, holiday, anniversary or just to say thank you to anyone.

specifications.Style: Freesia, Lavender, Rosemary and French Vanilla

specifications.Material: Soy wax and nature essential oil
